channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Donald Trump Threatens To Investigate Chris Christie After Former New Jersey Governor Criticizes Him On ABC’s ‘This Week’

4 journalists reportedly among dead in Israeli strike on Gaza hospital
item.description: Health officials in Gaza say an Israeli strike on Nasser Hospital has killed at least 15 people, including 4 journalists.

item.title: France summons US ambassador over 'unacceptable' letter about antisemitism
item.description: He wrote to Macron alleging France did not do enough to combat antisemitism.

item.title: Maps show Tropical Storm Fernand's path and forecast in Atlantic
item.description: Fernand is the sixth named storm of the 2025 Atlantic hurricane season.
